import React from "react"; import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; import Card from "@material-ui/core/Card"; import CardActions from "@material-ui/core/CardActions"; import CardContent from "@material-ui/core/CardContent"; import { Grid, CardActionArea } from "@material-ui/core"; import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import Container from "@material-ui/core/Container"; import CodeIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Code"; import VisibilityIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Visibility"; //card buttons style const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ yWord: { color: '#dbb700', }, bullet: { display: "inline-block", margin: "0 4px", transform: "scale(1.2)", }, button: { margin: theme.spacing(1), }, icon: { marginRight: theme.spacing(2), }, heroContent: { // backgroundColor: "#eaded0", color: "#eaded0", padding: theme.spacing(8, 0, 6), }, heroButtons: { marginTop: theme.spacing(4), }, cardGrid: { paddingTop: theme.spacing(8), paddingBottom: theme.spacing(8), maxWidth: 1300, background: "#5f5b60", }, card: { // maxWidth: 345, height: "100%", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", }, cardMedia: { paddingTop: "56.25%", // 16:9 }, cardContent: { flexGrow: 1, // background: '#dbb700' textAlign: "justify", }, cardYellow: { background: "#dbb700", }, cardBlue: { background: "#19a9bc", }, cardBlack: { background: "#0f0a10", }, cardWhite: { background: "#eaded0", }, })); // const cards = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9]; export default function Album() { const classes = useStyles(); const bull = ; return ( {/* Portfolio + more projects + {/* A Full Stack Developer with several skills to contribute to your company and team. I also bring to the table my experience in SEO and Conversion Rate Optimization.{" "} */} {/* End hero unit */} {/* {cards.map((card) => ( */} {/* Place your cards */} {/* Card 0 Yellow */} GraphQL API with Authorization React {bull} GraphQL API {bull} Apollo {bull} Material UI A React GraphQL Rick & Morty API {" "} with Apollo, Material UI and user authentication. {/* Card 1 Yellow */} Burger Builder - Menu React {bull} Node.js {bull} Express {bull} Firebase Realtime Database A React Burger Builder App with{" "} database and deployment on{" "} Firebase. You can build your own burger, with many pieces of salad, bacon, cheese, and meat, in{" "} any screen size. {/* Card 2 Blue */} eT-exerciseTracker App MongoDB {bull} Express {bull} React {bull} Node.js MERN Stack - A React{" "} Exercise Tracker App with MongoDB,{" "} Express, and Node.js on the backend.
Extra dependencies: mongoose,{" "} axios, react-router-dom,{" "} bootstrap,{" "} react-datepicker, cors. eT - your personal exercise tracker,{" "} so good,{" "} it is out of this planet! Give it a try! {/* Card 3 Black*/} React Todo List React {bull} JSON {bull} REST API {bull} Axios A React Todo List with JSONPlaceholder Fake online REST that acts as a backend server that feeds data to the app. {/* Card 4 Blue */} Tic-tac-toe game with time travel React The title says it all. {/* Card 5 White*/} Post & Reserve App JavaScript {bull} Node.js {bull} Express {bull} MongoDB{" "} {bull} Passport.js Sign Up, Login,{" "} Create and Delete your own{" "} Posts and Comments. A Project using JavaScript,{" "} HTML, CSS,{" "} Node.js, Express, mongoose with MongoDB,{" "} authentication, and authorization with{" "} Passport.js. {/* Card 6 Yellow */} Vanilla JS Todo List JavaScript {bull} HTML {bull} CSS A charming JavaScript Todo List, design with CSS. ); }
